name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_223Fr
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Fr" means the element "francium" and "223Fr" is the isotope "francium-223" with a half-life of 1.53e-02 days.
